# 1999 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1999 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 2000 for the 1999 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) was expanded to top 13.
